tool_description: testing environment for creating shipping labels using different carriers, calculating shipping prices, manifesting, carrier pickup, eVS & ePostage certified.
name: International Bridge Blue Sandbox
title: International Bridge Blue Sandbox

api_list.name: Get Streets
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://international-bridge-blue-sandbox.p.rapidapi.comhttps://api.myibservices.com/v1/address/streets?zip5=94301"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "international-bridge-blue-sandbox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
